title: Adaptive Learning Environment Design and Content Recommendation for Science Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and their application in professional settings
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment with real-time collaboration tools and project-based assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can design real-world problem-solving processes in science through Problem-Based Learning (PBL)
Learners can identify personalized learning pathways with over 80% accuracy using an adaptive recommendation system
Learners can improve learning efficiency by over 30% by analyzing content recommendations based on genetic algorithms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
